name: Dino Racers
description:
Dino Racers is a Bare-Knuckle Racing Battle Between Jurassic, Classic Car Wrecking Reptiles!

Dino Racers is an 8-bit fever dream! 

Dino Racers is currently nebulous in terms of a gameplay goal!

...Dino Racers!

Dino Racers is my entry for GBCompo2021,  it's a racing game built with the amazing GB Studio. My initial goal is to create a fluid side scrolling racing action game. The engine features fast-scrolling, linear, stage-based racing with lots of on screen action. 

Controls:

A(z) - Speed up
B(x) - Boost, when ready

  • Features Wish-List (In some particular order):
    • Health System
    • Boost-Attack
    • Rival Driver
    • Speed Pads
    • Slow Pads
    • Pickups 
    • Timer
    • Endless Mode

This is more of a tech demo check the devlog for more detailed notes.

This is in progress, check back for updates, or better yet follow me!

Fonts: https://jeremyoduber.itch.io/fonts-for-gb-studio
